animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I say 'Woof' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🐕 I am a good friend to humans.

animal.question: I hop around and like to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐾 I can be white, brown, or black.
🐇 I am a small, furry animal.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🩱 I like to swim in water.

animal.question: I am big and gray with a long trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I roar and I'm known as the king of the jungle. What am I?
I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I look a bit like a horse.

animal.question: I hiss and slither on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 Some are venomous, some are not.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have many sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 Some people are scared of me.

animal.question: I live in the Arctic and have thick fur to stay warm. What am I?

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. I take you to school! What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Many people can ride in me together.
🛑 I stop at special places to pick people up.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ I have wings but can't sing.
🌍 I can take you to another country!

transport.question: I go on the water and can carry many people and things. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 I am bigger than a boat.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔔 You can ring me to let people know you're coming!

transport.question: I go on tracks and take people to different cities. What am I?

hints.text: 📣 I often arrive at a station.

transport.question: I am a car that can take you anywhere, if you pay the driver. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I usually have a meter inside.
🚦 You can hail me on the street.

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights, and I rush to help people in trouble. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I am a type of emergency vehicle.
🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🤕 I help people who are hurt.

transport.question: I help build big things. I can lift and move heavy stuff. What am I?

hints.text: 🏗️ You often see me on a construction site.
🧱 I can lift really heavy blocks.

transport.question: I can travel to space! I am very fast and pointy at the top. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I go very far beyond the Earth.

transport.question: I'm a bike, but I go super fast! I need gas to go. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ You have to wear a helmet when riding me.
